channel.title: Corrupt Combat
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Corrupt Combat[/size][/center]
What is Corrupt Combat?
Corrupt Combat is a Project Insanity based 317 PK Server. Our main goal is to offer a great Player vs Player experience, ignoring everything else. We have two versions of the server, one is a PVP World, the other is wilderness only PVP. I wont waste my time listing how we have curses etc as these were all in the base. We are using Vistex V7 as a base as I feel this is currently the best PK source available. We will have unspawnable items such as nex armour, korasis etc. I personally would remove all of these new items and stick with the oldschool weapons, but the PK community wouldn't like that.
Our goals
Perfect Combat Perfect Switching Log on and PK All weapons the community want Easy access to PvP Large Playerbase
I'm a big fan of RunescapeWebclients, or RSW and this project will start of there. I hosted it as a BETA testing version, and within five days we had over 300 character files and were in the top 5.
All other decisions such as the version we use, PvP or Wilderness will all be decided later on.
Media: Adding later

item.title: Corrupt Combat
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

300 char files in 5 days? Damn you guys blow.

item.title: Corrupt Combat
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

PvPXile:

I personally would remove all of these new items and stick with the oldschool weapons, but the PK community wouldn’t like that.

It’s your RuneScape Private Server. You can remove whatever you see fit. I’m sure a lot of people would love an old school PvP oriented Server.

Large Playerbase
within five days we had over 300 character files and were in the top 5.

Your Player Base sounds like a lie, because the numbers don’t add up. Good luck nonetheless.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupt Combat
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Corrupt Combat[/size][/center]

What is Corrupt Combat?

Corrupt Combat is a Project Insanity based 317 PK Server. Our main goal is to offer a great Player vs Player experience, ignoring everything else. We have two versions of the server, one is a PVP World, the other is wilderness only PVP. I wont waste my time listing how we have curses etc as these were all in the base. We are using Vistex V7 as a base as I feel this is currently the best PK source available. We will have unspawnable items such as nex armour, korasis etc. I personally would remove all of these new items and stick with the oldschool weapons, but the PK community wouldn’t like that.

Our goals

Perfect Combat
Perfect Switching
Log on and PK
All weapons the community want
Easy access to PvP
Large Playerbase

I’m a big fan of RunescapeWebclients, or RSW and this project will start of there. I hosted it as a BETA testing version, and within five days we had over 300 character files and were in the top 5.

All other decisions such as the version we use, PvP or Wilderness will all be decided later on.
